ygData.subject: Re: Tongues, blue cons, and etiquette
ygData.msgSnippet: OK -- a follow-up to my own post on this. Ran across this on at Allakhazam (everquest.allakhazam.ocm) in the Rogue strategy discussion. Someone got popped by
ygData.messageBody:
OK -- a follow-up to my own post on this. Ran
across this on at Allakhazam (everquest.allakhazam.ocm)
in the Rogue strategy discussion. Someone got popped
by an Orc Legionnaire while hiding and recuperating
from a Griffin attack: <br><br>"LOL well First of all
u could have horrible fraction with ORCS. And
secondly aren't legionnaires RED to you. Hiding from
higher lvls isnt as successful as from things that con
BLUE and GREEN. Keep this in mind. The Griffin
probabaly would have killed u too if he got up close. If u
hunt ORC u pretty much have bad faction with them so
the orcs anywhere are aggro to u. Even orcs with
names. If it looks like an orc it hates
you!!!!"<br><br>That makes much more sense - but jeez, why don't they
tell you this at the guild hall?!<br><br>Kharlisht of
Kaladim<br>7th season Rogue<br>Drinal
